name: IamAmmo
description:
Story - After Skynetwork is destroyed along with the earth,  only a few people survived in a spaceship.   The spaceship had drones that clear the asteroid paths, but Skynetwork inserted itself into those drones when the spaceship was built and these drones self-replicated themselves and filled the vast region of space.  Jim Connor's Grandson Jonathon Connor's consciousness is transferred into an invincible shotgun. This shotgun material can't be destroyed by any force. But this gun requires ammo to function. Now Connor is on a battle mission to destroy all the space terminators and restore peace for eternity.  When he came out of the ship, he said his favorite dialog of his grandfather friend, which is "I am Ammo".

You are a shotgun with a mission to destroy many space terminators as possible.    Collect ammo as you go,  out of ammo means you are out of the game. Destroying the space terminator also earns you more ammo than collecting ammo scattered in the space. 

The more you have ammo, the higher will be the precaution taken by the space terminators. So be careful when you have more ammo. 

Controls

  • Left click -     Shoot
  • Right click -  Arrow and Slow Down
  • Mouse -          Aiming

Score as high as possible.

Congratulations on your mission Mr.Connor.
